reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Hasn’t worked since installed - expensive piece of junk
reviews.reviewText: I can’t rate the features since the appliance has not worked since it was installed. Warranty service is abysmal. Tech never showed up on day scheduled. Customer service on follow up told me they had diagnosed remotely and were waiting for part. Next follow up with customer service was given a local number to call for me to follow up on my own on status of service. Called local number, they are at least two weeks out on scheduling (no word on ordering part as on previous call to customer service). Directed to call back in a week to see if my service call even scheduled yet. Worst appliance purchase I have ever made.Sept 2002 update. Expecting second replacement shortly (third unit). First replacement was mishandled, came with broken ceramic tray and very noisy opening mechanism. Hope third time is the charm.March 2023 update. Microwave no longer working. Bought extended warranty and now Sharp and warranty company arguing about who is going to cover repair. Getting run around yet again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to my kitchen
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful addition to my kitchen. I've been using it for 3 months now and I still don't get why the negative reviews - it's a beautiful microwave & the airfryer crisps nuggets & fries perfectly. Yes a few minutes longer but that's all. It's very pretty too. I agree the alexa app & wifi needs work but I expected that and there will be updates Im sure. Just like everynwofi product. The drawer is very easy to use if you take the time to learn how to use it! There's a learning curve but it's worth it. My family loves it. And now we don't even think about it. Plus it's just as quick as an 1100 unit. People just don't have patience to learn. This is not a countertop or under the hood microwave. You need to read and learn. But once you do it's amazing. My family enjoys cooking with it or just to heat up soup. I feel Sharp put a lot of executive chef creative design into this product. Glad I did not listen to the negative reviews. It's definitely state of the art and impressive. That said, if you just want a microwave to slap around and not learn how to use it, well then, this is not for you. We use it all day - from popcorn to reheating, airfrying and yes toast - but it's not a toaster. It crisps the bread. And it perfectly defrosts ground beef /food without cooking edges. We even baked a few frozen chocolate chip cookie dough & they came out delightful. Nice appliance. It's a chef microwave that's classy & really nice to have. And very easy to use if you use it right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY THIS!
reviews.reviewText: We had this unit for about a year. It died after 10 months. It will not power on. Even when it was working, the microwave is about 30% weaker than any microwave you’ve ever used. The drawer is clunky. Whole thing feels cheap. Not at all worth the price. Definitely would not buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am unimpressed with this appliance in the microwave mode. 900 watts is ridiculous in this day and age. I had to microwave a bag of popcorn the other day for 5-6 minutes to get it to pop at all and still had a handful of unpopped kernels at the bottom. Had I known this was the case I would not have spent the money. Microwaving is supposed to shorten cooking time . I did call the company to check to make sure that this is the way it's supposed to operate as I thought perhaps it wasn't functioning properly but was told that everything will take twice as long. I have not used any of the other features yet but plan to to see if everything else takes twice as long. If it does, this is a real rip off and an expensive one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy. Sharp is non supportive
reviews.reviewText: I will not buy another Sharp product. Spend your money on something else.1) a 2500 dollar convection microwave that does not do convection2) It sat in a box while our kitchen remodel went on for over a year due to Covid. So it was out of warranty before it was removed from the box. Brilliant3) Cannot get a repair man to work on it.4) Foreign Phone support unknowledgeable on product.
